Detailed Description

RequestPacket for translating the supplied map and nodeID:s from one level to another, (e.g.

from lower level to higher). The packet takes a number of IDPairVector_t-pointers and the number of pointers as inparameter. The module should translate the nodes to their counterpart on the requested level and if it is impossible, the mapID and nodeID should be MAX_UINT32. The nodes should keep their position in the vector so that the receiver can keep track of which node is which.
The packet should probably be sent to a module with an overviewmap.
After the normal header the packet contains (X is REQUEST_HEADER_SIZE):
PosSizeComment
X 4 bytes User defined data. Should be copied to the reply
X + 4 1 byte Flags. Bit zero is translateToLower.
X + 5 3 bytes Unused.
X + 8 4 bytes Unused.
X + 12 4 bytes Nbr of nodevectors.
X + 16 4 bytes*nbr of nodevectors Sizes of nodevectors start here
Each nodevector consists of:
PosSizeComment
Y 8 bytes*nbrNodes mapid, nodeid

Definition at line 56 of file IDTranslationPacket.h.
